sections.heading: Firearms manufacturers, distributors, and sellers not liable for injury caused by firearms.

sections.heading: Associations of licensed firearms importers, manufacturers, or dealers not liable for injury caused by firearms.

sections.heading: No limitation on liability for certain actions--Firearm's potential to cause injury not a defective condition.
